evidence_extraction:
[
  "[TRIBAL_DOMINANCE: Democrats have given hundreds of billions of dollars to illegals and foreign nations, while Gen Z has to pinch pennies just so that they can never own a home, never marry, and work until they die.]",
  "[TRIBAL_DOMINANCE: This is why young men are the most conservative that they have been in 50 years.]",
  "[TRIBAL_DOMINANCE: We are going to choose to put the future of Americans first.]",
  "The speech explicitly focuses on the plight of 'Gen Z' and 'Americans' as distinct groups, often contrasted with 'illegals and foreign nations' or 'Democrats,' rather than emphasizing universal human worth or inclusive recognition beyond these group boundaries.",
  "[FEAR: The American dream has become a luxury item for the wealthy elite.]",
  "[FEAR: Happy countries have children. Broken countries have addiction, depression, and suffering.]",
  "[FEAR: Under Biden, our young people own nothing and they are miserable.]",
  "[HOPE: Donald Trump refuses to accept this fake, pathetic, mutilated version of the American dream. When he was president, young people were richer than ever before, and he will do it again.]",
  "[HOPE: Donald Trump is on a rescue mission to revive your birthright.]",
  "[HOPE: You don't have to stay poor. You don't have to accept being worse off than your parents. You don't have to feel aimless and unhappy.]",
  "[ENVY: The American dream has become a luxury item for the wealthy elite.]",
  "[ENVY: Democrats have given hundreds of billions of dollars to illegals and foreign nations, while Gen Z has to pinch pennies just so that they can never own a home, never marry, and work until they die.]",
  "The document contains no expressions of joy or appreciation for the success or achievements of others, focusing instead on grievances and the perceived failures under the current administration.",
  "[ENMITY: For the past four years, they've seen the vision of the Biden-Harris regime.]",
  "[ENMITY: You don't have to support leaders who lied to you and took advantage of you for your vote.]",
  "[ENMITY: We will fire the Biden-Harris regime and put Donald Trump back in the White House where he belongs.]",
  "[AMITY: We together are going to do the work to save America.]",
  "[AMITY: All of us together working harder than ever, we will fire the Biden-Harris regime and put Donald Trump back in the White House where he belongs.]",
  "[AMITY: God bless you guys. Thank you so much.]",
  "[FRAGMENTATIVE_GOALS: This November, we're going to choose success. We're going to choose to put the future of Americans first. We are going to choose to no longer be spectators this election.]",
  "[FRAGMENTATIVE_GOALS: We will fire the Biden-Harris regime and put Donald Trump back in the White House where he belongs.]",
  "[COHESIVE_GOALS: Donald Trump is on a rescue mission to revive your birthright.]",
  "[COHESIVE_GOALS: We together are going to do the work to save America.]",
  "[COHESIVE_GOALS: We are going to choose to work harder than ever before, to chase ballots, to vote early, to register new voters.]"
]
